successes.title: ACTON RocketSkates: World's First Smart Wearable Mobility
successes.description: The ACTON Rocketskates™ are Wearable Mobility. Remote-free, Strap-in, Smart electric skates.

Pledges.description:
SUPPORT
Thanks for your support! We'll give you a big shout out on our website. Supporters also receive a stylish limited edition ACTON R Key Ring.

BOOST
Thanks for the extra boost! We'll give you a big shout out on our website. Supporters also receive a stylish limited edition ACTON R Key Ring and ACTON T-shirt.

ROCKET DEAL
The first 25 backers to pledge get special Kickstarter RocketSkates at $199! (More than $300 off retail price). Backers of the Rocket Deal will receive One Pair of ACTON R-6 in "Rocket Red" color, each serialized #1 - #25. Come and get 'em, these are going, fast!

OK, wow- sold out of the Rocket Deal, fast! As a token of our appreciation, here’s another flash deal! (More than $250 off retail price). Backers of the Rocket Deal #2 will receive One Pair of “Rocket Red” color R-6 RocketSkates Pack.

ROCKET DEAL #5 R6 We heard you- our fans have been asking for the 
popular R6 Rocket Deal, now at $349. More than $250 
off retail price, including Stretch Goal accessories! 
Backers of the Rocket Deal #5 will receive One Pair of “Rocket Red” color R-6 RocketSkates Pack.

EARLY BIRD
Get one pair of R-6 RocketSkates Pack in "Rocket Red" color at more than $100 off retail price.
(ACTON R-6 RocketSkates Pack: Structural carry case/dock + batteries + chargers + key ring included)
You asked for it- so here it is! Flash deal for the R-8. (More than $200 off retail price). Backers of the Rocket Deal #3 will receive One Pair of "Terminator Chrome" color R-8 RocketSkates Pack.
So there you have it- the flash deal for the R-10! (More than $249 off retail price). Backers of the Rocket Deal #4 will receive One Pair of "Deep Space Black" color R-10 RocketSkates Pack.
*Please note this version of the R-10 will not be serialized. The Pioneer Black tier is a special Kickstarter edition.

Rocket Deal #6 Last round of flash deals- here’s the R-8 at more than $150 off retail price! Backers of the Rocket Deal #6 get One Pair of Terminator Chrome color R-8 RocketSkates Pack. Hurry, there are only 100 of these to snag!

DEVELOPER PACK 
Get one pair of  ACTON R-6 RocketSkates Pack in “Rocket Red” color at more than $100 off retail price + the ACTON Software Developers Kit.
(ACTON R-6 RocketSkates Pack: Structural carry case/dock + batteries + chargers + key ring included)

PIONEER CHROME
Get one pair of "Terminator Chrome" color R-8 RocketSkates Pack at more than $100 off retail price.
(ACTON R-8 RocketSkates Pack: Structural carry case/dock + batteries + chargers + key ring + extra sets of tires are included)
Rocket Deal #7 Last round of flash deals- Get one pair of "Deep Space Black" color R-10 RocketSkates Pack at more than $200 off retail price. Your last chance to get the R10!

PIONEER BLACK
Get one pair of KS Special Serialized # "Deep Space Black" color R-10 RocketSkates Pack at more than $100 off retail price.
